"Afin":
"Well, we've arrived at the Ruins.
...This place is really crawling with Darkers."
"Which reminds me, the first time we met was our final exam here on Naberius, wasn't it?"
"I'll never forget that massive Darker attack. I'd never have got this far if I hadn't had your help."
"Tch, this isn't the time to start thinking about that stuff! Let's begin this request!"
